Title: Barley Tea Recipe
Text: Farmer @!^While travelling with my nephew, this town seemed like it could use a lot more tea! Allow me to share one of my favorite drinks to refresh myself in the summer.^-a passerby

Title: Health Blend Tea Recipe
Text: Hey @!^I heard you've been making tea at home. Apparently, if you mix together cassia tea, chrysanthemum tea, and goji berries it makes a blend that's really good for your overall health. Let me know if you give it a try!^-Sandy
